author: rwaldhoff
msg: * have executeMethod return the response code
* no need to close the connection in executeMethod
* adding a couple of HttpClient tests

author: rwaldhoff
msg: * changing setHttpState to setState (to be consistent with getState)

* removed getDebug/setDebug, since they were added for only Slide compatiblilty (which we've already broken in a number of places). We can always added them back in a later release (and still be compatible)

author: rwaldhoff
msg: switching from m_ to _ prefixes for attributes

author: rwaldhoff
msg: locking down the API a bit
(it'll be easier to make access more liberal in future releases than it will be to make it more constrained)
